definition: Ministry of Justice (PRC etc)/Justice Department (USA etc)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The Justice Department says those dismissals were based on poor performance.
sentences.chinese: 司法部称解雇是由于他们不良的工作表现。

sentences.english: Goodling no longer works at the department.
sentences.chinese: 古德林现已不在司法部工作。

sentences.english: In 1998 the Department of Justice launched an anti-trust case against Microsoft.
sentences.chinese: 1998年司法部门以反垄断之名起诉微软。

sentences.english: The Justice Dept., the e-mails suggested, had recommended that Bank of America hire Hunton & Williams.
sentences.chinese: 邮件暗示，司法部曾推荐美国银行雇佣何威。

sentences.english: Involved in serious violations of law, the transfer of the judiciary.
sentences.chinese: 涉及严重违法违纪行为的，移交司法部门处理。

sentences.english: But whether there will be a prosecution is for the secretary for justice to decide.
sentences.chinese: 但将由司法部长决定是否要对梁锦松事件进行起诉。

sentences.english: Review the function of the judicial branch, America’s federal court system.
sentences.chinese: 认识司法部门的功能，美国的联邦法院系统。

sentences.english: The Justice Department said it would ask for the injunction to be lifted, pending its appeal.
sentences.chinese: 司法部表示，会在上诉期间要求撤销这一禁令。

sentences.english: Research Team, Crime Prevention Institute, Ministry of Justice.
sentences.chinese: 司法部预防犯罪研究所课题组。

sentences.english: Nevertheless the local judiciary has insisted that Hamidi should be executed.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，当地司法部门仍坚持，哈米迪应该被处决。

sentences.english: This report is prepared under the direction of the Department's Chief Financial Officer (CFO).
sentences.chinese: 这份报告是在司法部首席财务官的指导下完成的。

sentences.english: The judicial system will deal with it. This is a form of crime itself.
sentences.chinese: 因为这本身就是一种犯罪，这样司法部门会处理。

sentences.english: The murderer delivered himself up to justice.
sentences.chinese: 那个凶手向司法部门投案自首。

sentences.english: Instead, he took a draft-exempt job at the Justice Department.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他在司法部谋得了一个可以免除兵役的位置。

sentences.english: Our unpleasant friend rejoices in the name of Minister of Justice.
sentences.chinese: 我们那讨厌的朋友浑名叫做司法部长。

sentences.english: The video spectral comparator is becoming the necessary instrument for identification for all judicial bureaus.
sentences.chinese: 文件检验仪已成为各级司法部门不可缺少的鉴定仪器。

pinyin: Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Jian3 cha2 yuan4

definition: Supreme Court of the United States
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Zui4 gao1 Fa3 yuan4
Zui4 gao1 Ren2 min2 Fa3 yuan4

definition: Ministry of Foreign Affairs/foreign office/Dept. of State
